summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2731, for the improvement of 31st Avenue, from East Union Street to East Pike Street, all in the City of Seattle, by construction of concrete sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 32247 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
